youtube.title: How Thumb Sucking Changes Your Face and Jaw Shape
youtube.description: Discover the biological impact of thumb sucking on facial development. This 3D animation shows how pressure from a thumb alters tooth alignment and jaw structure over time. Perfect for students and parents interested in dental health and anatomy.
